name: Off Road Car Driving Sim 2022
description:
Choose one of the most luxurious, beautiful suv vehicles, complete the challenging missions. You can play with your friends online and spend time together.

PARKING MODE
Learn how to park. Navigate your car with the utmost precision, through the parking lot, between realistic traffic, to your designated parking spot. Follow all traffic rules as you park vehicles.

FREE RIDE MODE
Driving School has a big open world city for you to drive around. Practice all the traffic rules, earn coins and XP that can be used in other modes.

FEATURES of Car Parking - Off - Road Driving :
- Many different vehicles to drive - car, bus, truck, van and more
- Fast and furious cars - SUV, Sedan, Hatchback, Luxury, MUV and more
- Huge open world environment to drive around
- Learn 60+ road signs
- Complete exciting missions
- Learn car parking
- Smooth and realistic handling of all vehicles
- Customise vehicles according to your liking
- Realistic game sounds
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Free drive
